name: Rama Beach Resort and Villas

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When we arrived at Rama Beach, we were told that we were given an upgrade to a Suite Pool Villa. We were overjoyed. We got a huge private pool, Flat screen TV in bathroom, Welcome Fruits and Drink and a free 30 minute massage at the Spa. Only problem is the distance, which was about 30 minutes walk from the Kuta centre. We mostly used taxi but you need to negotiate properly before stepping in. We would recommend this hotel to honeymooners who just want to laze and relax in the hotel area.
reviews.title: Very memorable

aka: Rama Beach Resort And Villas Hotel
